item.description: It's The Night before Halloween and we are going to celebrate Halloween on Tuesday Oct 30th at the Rosebud. So come join us and dress for the holiday. We will have special treats for all my singers, and a special prize for the best costume, so give it some thought. I expect to see Lady Gaga, Madonna, Ozzy Osbourne, maybe even the resurrection of a few like Freddie Mercury, Janis Joplin and of course Elvis in the House. Please FB invite your friends, I want this to be an Epic event at the Rosebud, one we won't soon forget. So plan to be here Oct 30th for a night of Scary-Oke. Can't wait to see who will show up, or rise from the dead!!!!!!!!!
item.name: Scary-oke Halloween Karaoke Party @ The Rosebud
